* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.

teams.name: Pilipinas
teams.loan_because:
We CAN help our kababayans be financially independent.

Let us provide the nets so they can fish.
teams.description:
This is OUR CHANCE to GIVE OUR COUNTRYMEN A CHANCE!!!

Your $25 will go a long, long way to create livelihood opportunities for our kababayans. Let us help them help themselves. Let us empower them to help lift themselves out of poverty.  And ... YOU GET YOUR MONEY BACK because they will pay you back!

To find a Filipino entrepreneurs, click on the LEND button and just type in "Philippines" in the search field. There are always a few new entrepreneurs on a daily basis. But if you don't see one on that day. Try again the following day.

Lend - NOW!!!!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.

teams.name: Christians Against Abortion
teams.loan_because: We want to be obedient to Jesus Christ: 'But love your enemies, do good, and lend, expecting nothing in return; and your reward will be great, and you will be sons of the Most High...' Luke 6:35
teams.description:
A group of believers in Jesus Christ, ready to sacrifice to follow Him.    

---- (1) We are committed to defending the unborn.   

The words of Jesus speak strongly to us in the present situation: 
'And when Jesus saw it, he was angry, and said to them, Let the little children come to me, and do not keep them away; for of such is the kingdom of God.' Mark 10:14 
'Whoever receives this little child in my name receives me, and whoever receives me receives him who sent me.' Luke 9:48

---- (2) We are motivated by the biblical call to equality: 'For I do not mean that others should be eased and you burdened; but at the present time your abundance should supply their need, so that their abundance may supply your need, that there may be equality.' 2 Corinthians 8:13-14

---- (3) We want to build this team of like-minded poeple as a place of encouragment and care. 

Join, if you believe in all the words of Jesus.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Seventh-day Adventists
teams.loan_because:
Through humanitarian acts we make known the just, merciful and loving character of God.

To work with those in need is an expression of our love for God.

The compassionate ministry of Jesus is its own abundant motive and reward.
teams.description:
The SDA Church is a Christian denomination which is distinguished mainly by its observance of Saturday, the original seventh day of the Judeo-Christian week, as the Sabbath.

The world church is governed by a General Conference, with smaller regions administered by divisions, union conferences and local conferences. It currently has a worldwide membership of over 15 million people, has a missionary presence in over 200 countries and territories and is ethnically and culturally diverse. The church operates numerous schools, hospitals and publishing houses worldwide, as well as a prominent humanitarian aid organization known as the Adventist Development and Relief Agency (ADRA).

teams.description: Our team is for the students, accounts and staff of the 18 Learning Centers that Dermalogica operates in the USA to provide post-graduate training for professional skin therapists.

teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds
